bioZh: 个人主页： https://sites.google.com/view/xjguo
bioEn: mainpage:   https://sites.google.com/view/xjguo

bioZh: 主要研究方向包括低光照图像增强、图像反射分解、图像超分辨率等
bioEn: Research interests include low-light image enhancement, reflection separation, and image super-resolution.

bioZh: 研究领域：图像增强、轻量化网络设计。
bioEn: Research areas: image enhancement and lightweight network design.

bioZh: 研究方向聚焦域适应/泛化与多模态理解 。
bioEn: Focuses on domain adaptation/generalization and multimodal understanding.

bioZh: 主要研究底层视觉相关任务，如去阴影、去反射等。
bioEn: Works on low-level vision topics such as shadow removal and reflection removal.

bioZh: 研究方向为目标检测。
bioEn: Research focus: object detection.

bioZh: 研究方向为低光图像增强等底层视觉任务。
bioEn: Research field: low-light image enhancement and other low-level vision tasks.

bioZh: 研究兴趣包括三维重建与模式识别，探究基于单/多目图像或视频的三维场景重建及结合物联网实现的综合理解。曾获“龙图杯”全国 BIM 大赛一等奖（第一完成人）
bioEn: Research interests include 3D reconstruction and pattern recognition, reconstructing scenes from mono/multi-view imagery and combining IoT data for holistic understanding. First-place winner of the “Longtu Cup” National BIM Competition

bioZh: 研究兴趣：量化超分。
bioEn: Research interests: quantized super-resolution.

bioZh: 研究方向包括扩散模型、图像退化机制与图像超分辨率等领域。
bioEn: Research interests include diffusion models, image degradation mechanisms, and image super-resolution.

bioZh: 希望在图像增强研究上走出属于自己的奥德赛。
bioEn: Aims to carve out a personal odyssey in image enhancement research.

bioZh: 研究方向为图像低光增强与超分辨率重建。
bioEn: Works on low-light image enhancement and super-resolution reconstruction.

bioZh: 研究兴趣：视觉语言大模型(VLM)、大模型加速方法、多模态融合。
bioEn: Research interests include vision-language models (VLMs), VLM acceleration, and multi-modal fusion.

bioZh: 低层次视觉研究，聚焦频域/小波与可学习先验，提升真实场景成像质量。
bioEn: Low-level vision: frequency/wavelet modeling and learnable priors for better real-world image quality.

bioZh: 研究方向为视觉语言模型的三维与时空表征学习，兴趣包括多模态学习、3D 视觉理解与大规模视觉语言模型。
bioEn: Research focuses on vision-language model representation learning for 3D and spatio-temporal understanding, with interests in multimodal learning, 3D vision, and large VLMs.

bioZh: 研究兴趣聚焦于底层视觉领域，特别是图像增强与图像恢复
bioEn: Research interests focus on low-level vision, especially image enhancement and restoration

bioZh: 研究变分自编码器与扩散模型的图像生成，图像超分，图像恢复等任务
就职于 天津中德应用技术大学
bioEn: Working at Tianjin Sino-German University of Applied Sciences

bioEn: Working at Hikvision

bioEn: Formerly at Huawei Noah's Ark Lab; pursuing PhD at Northeastern University (USA)

bioEn: Doctoral researcher who has graduated and joined Tianjin University of Technology.

bioZh: 从事计算机视觉相关研究，关注多曝光图像融合与图像去反射
bioEn: Works on computer vision with a focus on multi-exposure fusion and reflection removal

bioZh: 研究方向：文生人体动作、文生视频等生成式多模态任务。
bioEn: Researches text-to-human motion and text-to-video generation within multimodal generative models.

bioZh: 研究方向：计算机视觉
bioEn: Research areas:Computer Vision

bioZh: 鲁棒图像去噪研究方向，利用合成噪声训练去噪网络，期望泛化到域外与真实噪声。
bioEn: Research on robust image denoising; trains denoising networks with synthetic noise to generalize to out-of-domain and real-world noise.

bioZh: 就职于 苏州大学
bioEn: Working at Soochow University
